
DeepaMehta uses a jQuery UI custom build.

Basic Theme: "Smoothness"

Font Settings: "Lucida Grande", Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

Components (9):
    Core
    Widget
    Mouse
    Position

    Resizable
    Sortable

    Autocomplete
    Button
    Dialog

IMPORTANT: the generated CSS file must be adapted manually:
    \\\"Lucida Grande\\\" -> "Lucida Grande" (2 occurrences)
